description:
Having accepted Liu Bei`s request, Sun Jian Gundam Astray and his son depart at once for Pirate World, only to face sudden danger from the attack of a mysterious pirate group. The heroes are saved as their old friends Benjamin V2 Gundam and Edward Second V rush to join the fray. Sun Jian tells Benjamin about the world crisis and the Haros. Based on Benjamin`s idea, they immediately leap into action.
Meanwhile, Liu Bei`s group pass through a town on their way to Knight World...
Source: crunchyroll
